name: HF_Classification
title: HF_Classification
description: Plugin to load classification models from the Hugging Face Hub using the transformers API
author: Berthold Chloé & Cliquot Théo

inputs.name: model_path
inputs.description: Model path for the Hugging Face Hub of the classification model you want to use

inputs.name: image_folder
inputs.description: Folder where the image you want to use are located

inputs.name: image_format
inputs.description: Format of the image you want to analyse

outputs.name: output_filepath
outputs.description: File path where our csv result will be store
